articles.title: Twenty missing in Indonesia protests, rights group says
articles.description: Mass protests first erupted last week, prompted by anger over the perks and benefits given to lawmakers, including a controversial housing allowance

articles.title: Indonesia protests: president scraps lawmakers’ perks in bid to calm tensions
articles.description: Police set up checkpoints across Jakarta on Monday after deadly protests that have forced Prabowo Subianto to remove perks include a housing allowance worth 10 times the minimum wage

articles.title: Fire kills three people in Indonesia after protesters torch council buildings
articles.description: Cities in Indonesia rocked by protests after motorcycle taxi driver run over by police tactical vehicle

articles.title: Indonesia school collapse: three dead and over 90 missing as rescue effort continues
articles.description: Instability of building in East Java town hampers search but 99 boys and school staff known to have survived

articles.title: In Prabowo’s Indonesia, the military is quietly creeping back into civilian life
articles.description: The retired general who is now president has established 100 new army battalions and plans more – and critics say the move has echoes of the country’s authoritarian past

articles.title: Flights cancelled as Indonesia volcano erupts again – as it happened
articles.description: This blog is now closed

articles.title: Protests erupt in Indonesia over privileges for parliament members and ‘corrupt elites’
articles.description: Controversy over housing allowance, which is almost 10 times minimum wage, comes amid President Prabowo Subianto’s austerity drive

articles.title: Indonesia embassy official’s shooting in Lima probably a ‘contract killing’, says Peru government
articles.description: Interior minister says ‘they were waiting for’ official who was shot at point-blank range outside his home in killing that has shocked Peru

articles.title: Indonesia protests explained: why did they start and how has the government responded?
articles.description: Anger at perks for politicians spilled over into wider protests after the death of a 21-year-old delivery driver in Jakarta

articles.title: Indonesia school collapse: 91 missing and three dead as rescuers search rubble for second day
articles.description: More than 90 people missing and at least three dead after building collapses as students held prayers at school in Sidoarjo

articles.title: The Free School Lunch Program That Has Made Thousands of Children Sick
articles.description: Indonesia’s president says the meals are improving nutrition in the country. Critics have called for a halt to the program, saying it threatens public health.

articles.title: Before Trump, Indonesia Had Another Trade Headache: China
articles.description: Long before President Trump wielded tariffs as a weapon to punish Indonesia, the country was fighting back a flood of cheap Chinese goods.

articles.title: Around Here, It’s Not a Party Without a Bone-Rattling Speaker Truck
articles.description: A towering wall of speakers on wheels, shaking everything in sight: In many Javanese villages, there’s no big celebration without one.

articles.title: The Rainforests Being Cleared to Build Your R.V.
articles.description: American demand for tropical wood that is used in motor homes, conservationists say, is accelerating the disappearance of some of the world’s largest forests.

articles.title: Four Dead in Indonesia Unrest, Official Says
articles.description: In spreading protests against the president, three government workers died after jumping from a building that protesters set afire. A fourth person was attacked by a crowd and later died of his injuries.

articles.title: Indonesia’s Leader Says He Will Bow to Some Protester Demands After Riots
articles.description: President Prabowo Subianto of Indonesia acknowledged the concerns of the protesters and said his government would make concessions.

articles.title: Dozens of Students Are Missing After School Collapses in Indonesia
articles.description: At least three children were killed and about 100 injured after an Islamic boarding school collapsed during a prayer service, officials said.

articles.title: In New Deal, Trump Keeps Tariffs While Indonesia Drops Trade Barriers
articles.description: The administration provided some insight into the terms that were agreed upon between Indonesia and the United States, hinting at how other vague and hastily negotiated deals may turn out.

articles.title: Protests Spread Across Indonesia After a Deadly Clash With Police
articles.description: Rising unemployment and inflation have driven days of demonstrations. A 21-year-old man was killed when police responded with force to a protest on Thursday.

articles.title: Time Running Out for Trapped Students After School Collapse in Indonesia
articles.description: Workers rushed to free potential survivors two days after an Islamic boarding school collapsed during a prayer service, killing at least three students.
